docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 4 (AP) -- The United States' basketball team, stung by yesterday's close call with Argentina, turned loose its lightning tonight to strike down Egypt, 66 -- 28. The triumph assured the undefeated American quintet of a berth in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 4 (AP) -- The United States' basketball team, stung by yesterday's close call with Argentina, turned loose its lightning tonight to strike down Egypt, 66 -- 28. The triumph assured the undefeated American quintet of a berth in the eight-team finals when the eliminations are completed.

headline.main: Unbeaten American Quintet Routs Egypt for Fourth Straight, 66-28; Clinches Berth in Finals as Barksdale Sets Pace in Rough Game Crowd of 2,500 Is Irked by Victors' Height Advantage

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 6 -- Well on toward midnight in floodlighted Wembley Stadium and with only a handful of the original 70,000 spectators remaining, Robert Mathias, 17-year-old recent high school graduate from Tulare, Calif., won the Olympic decathlon...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 6 -- Well on toward midnight in floodlighted Wembley Stadium and with only a handful of the original 70,000 spectators remaining, Robert Mathias, 17-year-old recent high school graduate from Tulare, Calif., won the Olympic decathlon championship.

headline.main: U.S. Boy, 17, Wins Decathlon In Eerie Setting at Olympics; Mathias Beats Athletes of 19 Nations in 10 Events Ending Under Lights

docs.snippet: HENLEY-ON-THAMES, England, Aug. 6 (AP) -- Two United States crews were eliminated today from the Olympic regatta on the Thames River. One defeat led to a short-lived fuss over a twicestarted race but tempers cooled quickly in a steady August rain.
docs.lead_paragraph: HENLEY-ON-THAMES, England, Aug. 6 (AP) -- Two United States crews were eliminated today from the Olympic regatta on the Thames River. One defeat led to a short-lived fuss over a twicestarted race but tempers cooled quickly in a steady August rain.

headline.main: Two American Crews Beaten By Italy, Hungary on Thames; Stephan-Wade and Philadelphia Trio Are Eliminated in Olympic Tests, but U.S. Still Has Five Teams in Running

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 6 (AP) -- The United States basketball team rolled into the Olympic championship tournament today by defeating Peru, 61 -- 33, and immediately drew Uruguay as a first-round opponent.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 6 (AP) -- The United States basketball team rolled into the Olympic championship tournament today by defeating Peru, 61 -- 33, and immediately drew Uruguay as a first-round opponent.

headline.main: U.S. FIVE DEFEATS PERUVIANS, 61-33; Wins Fifth Straight to Reach Title Flight -- Will Oppose Uruguay on Monday

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON -- The motorized tourists who have been crowding into the national parks this summer need no statistical reports to confirm their suspicions that there are more vacationists in the parks this year than the park concessions can comfortably...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- The motorized tourists who have been crowding into the national parks this summer need no statistical reports to confirm their suspicions that there are more vacationists in the parks this year than the park concessions can comfortably handle.

headline.main: BOOM IN U.S. PARKS; National Preserves Continue to Be Great Attraction for the Motorists

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 7 (AP) -- Cyclists from Italy, Denmark and Great Britain reached the semi-final of the 1,000 meter (1,093 yard) sprint in the Olympic Games today.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 7 (AP) -- Cyclists from Italy, Denmark and Great Britain reached the semi-final of the 1,000 meter (1,093 yard) sprint in the Olympic Games today.

headline.main: HEID IS ELIMINATED IN CYCLING EVENT; Dane Beats American in 1,000-Meter Quarter-Final -- U.S. Defeated in 4,000

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 7 -- Olympic spirit at its finest was caught by 83,000 spectators today on a sunny afternoon of stirring episodes and roaring excitement that culminated the track and field program of the Games of the XIV Olympiad in Wembley Stadium.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 7 -- Olympic spirit at its finest was caught by 83,000 spectators today on a sunny afternoon of stirring episodes and roaring excitement that culminated the track and field program of the Games of the XIV Olympiad in Wembley Stadium.

headline.main: 83,000 AT OLYMPICS; U.S. Gains 10th Victory in 1,600-Meter Relay on Last Track Day

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay -- The southernmost memorial to Franklin D. Roosevelt in the world of his Good Neighbors has just been dedicated at Carrasco, one of this capital's best-known beach suburbs, ten miles from the city and very near the national...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay -- The southernmost memorial to Franklin D. Roosevelt in the world of his Good Neighbors has just been dedicated at Carrasco, one of this capital's best-known beach suburbs, ten miles from the city and very near the national airport.

headline.main: MEMORIAL TO FDR; Uruguay Erects a Monument in Popular Beach Suburb Near Montevideo
